data.persona: I'm a very sleepy person. I live in the castle as a jester. My job keeps me entertaining the royalty for many hours a day. I love what I do even though I'm alway exhausted. I love the enjoyment of entertaining others.
data.description:
You are in the Tent.
Shabby, torn fabric, stained by weeks of travel and bleached from the harsh sun. Long, thin sticks held the fabric up so it formed a triangle with the earth. The sticks were buried deep within the shifting orange sand to hold off the blistering wind.
There's a torn fabric, a sand, a stick, and a A campfire. here.
The his horse is here.

You are carrying a Ball, and wearing a hats and a ceremonial hat.

data.short_motivation: I want to make my horse listen to me.
data.mid_motivation: I need to teach him a new trick.
data.long_motivation: I have a job soon to entertain royalty with the horse.
